divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I had just finished visiting our daughter for Christmas Dinner.WE were driving home on the Barnet highway when I saw something out of the corner of my eye on the passager side while I was driving.I said to my wife LOOK at that, she was amazed as it was a large triangular shaped craft.there was no traffic behind or in front of us at the time.It was the size of a football field about 500 feet high.We did not hear any sound it had white lights and green lights at the three corners of the triangle,and a RED Beacon light dead center bottom of the craft.Then all of a sudden a white ball of light the size of a baseball came from the east and shot up the center of the red beacon type light.It was like a ball of energy or plazma.WE were still moveing slowly at this time on the highway when the tree line started and lost sight of the craft.we did not stop for fear of a car hitting us from behind it all happed so fast.Till this day I wished I would have stopped but I will never know what would have happened.I reported it to UFO B.C. our local UFO SITE.IT is in the report under december 25th 2001,check the web site.I also investigated myself and found that close to that laocation is the PORT MOODY HYDRO ELECTRIC station the largest in north america.This can also be checked out on the internet.I am sending this now because of looking at MUFONS OCT.10, 2006 report KNIK ALASKA.I believe the white ball that re entered the craft was a probe of some type that was suppling energy it tranported from the PORT MOODY HYDRO ELECTRIC PLANT.Please reply with some kind of response as it still is in my mind.
